website_summaries.verdict: This striking bass isn't just about shock value, it plays well and features a solid alder body and maple neck.
pros: If you want a bright tone with a crunchy sound, this is the bass for you
The diecast hardware is of surprisingly good quality for the price
The 20-fret neck makes things easier for smaller players
cons: The bright color isn't to everyone's taste

customer_reviews.title: Great bass, especially after upgrades
customer_reviews.text: I thought this thing sounded pretty OK out of the box. Good tone and sustain. After upgrading the pickups to Duncan Seymour Quarter Pounders and the stings to cobalt Slinkys, it sounds GREAT. Lots of bite and grit, but full and clean at the same time. Also had the electrical tuned up as there was a slightly loose connection. Anyway, bought it for the look (got the pink one), of course, but after upgrading it checks all the boxes. Also stays in tune FOREVER. I love this bass.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and bright
customer_reviews.text: This bass is the perfect size, sounds great, and is soooo pretty!!!! I play a lot of crabcore and metalcore and this bass has the perfect sound for it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Dude... This is my very first bass. And it sounds incredible. Can't beat the price. Looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Pink is Just as bright in real life.
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by this super cute bass. it was in tune out of the shipping container in the winter!! it has small issues as expected with new guitar... knobs n screws that need to be tightened... but overall Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Barky

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Love it, Love it
customer_reviews.text: This bass guitar steals the show and will get folks talking. Everyone who plays asks to see it, touch it, hear it. The color is subtle in the pics compared to the guitar in person. Add glow in the dark green strings and neon green DiMarzio Nylon ClipLock to complete the look. Great tone, for the price - it's a bargain. I was skeptical but Dean definintely makes a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Levelbest

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We love this bass! We bought it for our 8 year old daughter and it was a great addition to the family.
customer_reviews.author: So Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bass
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bass. My daughter has had a few concerts already and she stands out. Looks and sounds awesome! Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Huh?

customer_reviews.title: Great bass for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bass. A head turner. Played perfect right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L Rose

customer_reviews.title: Pure Awesomeness !!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning in person. Light, and plays nice. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bass! Really sharp and clear!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice rich sound and the action is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughter. She loves the color. I played it and it plays quite well. It has a nice rich sound and the action is fantastic. Had this not been a Dean, it would probably cost 2 or 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Bendu

customer_reviews.title: Exercitum Bass player J.Draven
customer_reviews.text: This is Joey Draven from Exercitum and whenever I play this bass live I constantly have people ask me where I got it and if it's custom made. Great sound crazy awesome prize, and guys out there just saying a lot of chicks try to start conversations about this bass
customer_reviews.author: Jack Draven

customer_reviews.title: Dean Nuclear Green Bass looks and plays well
customer_reviews.text: This Dean Bass is very worth more than the price. Looks and sounds amazing. I may purchase another color in the future. If you are a starter this is in your budget. I played Bauhaus "Bela Lugosi Is Dead" right off... very amazing sound. You cannot go wrong with a Dean.
customer_reviews.author: whiteelviszombie

customer_reviews.title: Great love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and bright great bass. Sounds crisp and clean. Well packed and came ready to play all i had to do was tune.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K.

customer_reviews.title: It plays like how much it costs
customer_reviews.text: It plays like how much it costs. Still, good sound. But it didn't take long for my tone knob to come off, and I had to reconnect a wire to the tone knob after some turning.
customer_reviews.author: Max Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bass, great price
customer_reviews.text: Man I love this bass! It sounds amazing plays very well. Not to mention the paint job really pops!
customer_reviews.author: DarkLotus07

customer_reviews.title: best bass ive ever owned
customer_reviews.text: this bass is amazing, sounds great, beautiful, and everyone i know who plays wants to steal it from me lol. best $200.00 ive ever spend on a bass!!!!
customer_reviews.author: d.cammiller

customer_reviews.title: Steal the show with this bass.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing fancy about this bass, but get some good strings with a setup and you're in business.
customer_reviews.author: Micky Rivera

customer_reviews.title: it was a christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a christmas gift and my daughter loved it adn it has not had anything go wrong yet i would reccomend this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent beginner bass
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, stays in tune reasonably well, fun to play and the color just pops.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: easy to play
customer_reviews.text: it sounds good and is a solid bass, The paint is a little bit darker than what i shown in the picture. it stays in tune well, doesnt buzz
customer_reviews.author: metalb00

customer_reviews.title: BAD ASS BASS !!
customer_reviews.text: This Bass is Spectacular for the Value and Money Spent !! Thank You !!
customer_reviews.author: TOMMY TESLA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is fabulous and the guitar itself is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice guitar!
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty - not as neon looking in person as it appears in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Monteza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and sound... And the color gets lot's of attention and compliment
customer_reviews.author: Sean Edwards

customer_reviews.title: sharp frets
customer_reviews.text: A great beginner bass. My only issue is that the frets are sharp to the touch on the edges and i have sliced my finger open once or twice while sliding down the neck. Sanding them down should fix that issue
customer_reviews.author: tony hampton

customer_reviews.title: Greeeeeeeeen
customer_reviews.text: Visually stunning. I was shocked by how vibrant this bass is. Also, plays beautifully. Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bass
customer_reviews.text: I got this bass for my husband. He loves it. It arrived quickly with no scratches or anything. It tuned right up and sounded great. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the sound it puts out
customer_reviews.text: I had have mine for six months. I love the sound it puts out.I had a Tobias bass with active pick ups. I sold it cause the dean had a much stronger sound. I recommend this bass for any body.
customer_reviews.author: tara carte

customer_reviews.title: great bass for your buck
customer_reviews.text: bought this baby for my son, maybe he will get to play it if I can ever put it down.
customer_reviews.author: J. davis

customer_reviews.title: A scuff and crack here and there
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine except for a scuff and a crack
customer_reviews.author: Jay Toussaint

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time. Good condition. A whole lot greener than i thought it would be which is awesome! Sounds great, works great, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE MANNING

customer_reviews.title: It's really a nice bass!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand son, but I play also, this bass is a super play, everything on it works great and has a very good paint job, plays like any $1500 bass I've played but only cost $200! Wonderful starter bass! Grandson loves the color, actually I do too!
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Besides the buzzing it seemed like a quality instrument
customer_reviews.text: The bass itself was a decent bass although it was damaged on arrival. It had scratches and there was a buzzing around the 2nd fret. Also one of the strap holders was broke. I can't say much about how it works in the long run because I sent it back the day I got it. Besides the buzzing it seemed like a quality instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived several days sooner than expected and the picture didnt do it justice. Gorgeous product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he says, "It is EXCELLENT!" He's spent hours on it already.
customer_reviews.author: Ms

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This Bass is something from out of this world. The color...WILD. The look...HOTT. The shape....SEXY. I was sooooo impressed as was my fiance who I bought it for. Holding this thing makes anyone look good. :)
customer_reviews.author: R. King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: plays nice for what i need it for.... not bad at all..ty dean!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: that it performed like it was supposed to petform
customer_reviews.text: I thought, when I first made a review about this, that it performed like it was supposed to petform. But I've noticed, when trying to plug in the cord to my amp, that the plug input doesn't even work. It's broken. So I pretty much bought a useless piece of trash..Refraining from the other word that I could've used..I couldn't be MORE UPSET as I am right now. Be careful when ordering these.
customer_reviews.author: Ulfhedinn Odinn

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift. Works great!!! The receiver was very happy with this product. Would recommend. Great value and product. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bass for any one
customer_reviews.text: I have had so much fun with this bass. I like it more than my squire and more than some yamahas. It's really great and fairly cheap. Recommended for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bass for looks
customer_reviews.text: Its not a American Fender Bass, but it does the job... Quality 6 out of 10. Very Pretty Bass thought.
customer_reviews.author: Pahola

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Guitar is really good, especially for this price, but tuning machines are all screwed up. Two of them broke, so I had to replace them, so when you're buying the guitar keep that expense in your mind.
customer_reviews.author: PowerPoint

customer_reviews.title: awesome color, great tone, good playability
customer_reviews.text: i got this bass to do recording for my metal band, and it sounds great on recording and when played live. The color is much brighter in person and looks awesome. Great tone and am very pleased with how little i had to pay for it
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great beginner base
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great beginner base. I've just recently started playing bass and started with this. I definitely recommend it if you're a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: William Parker

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The bass plays very good but the cord jack is loose and one of the volume knobs is broken, other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McClain

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: This bass is AMAZING!!! the sound is incredible! And the color is so cool It's so great I would recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Dori Bush

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: its is perfect i love it. it is exactically what i thought it was going to be like. i cant seem to put it down.
customer_reviews.author: twinkie#2

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money- this is pitiful
customer_reviews.text: This bass guitar is terrible. The nut is soft plastic, the string ate into the groove causing a buzz. When my son's music teacher tried to change the strings he noticed this, he stated that he had never seen a nut made of such soft material. Then when he removed the screw, or TRIED to remove it, it broke off in the head. Very cheaply made bass, I do not recommend this to anyone. If I could give 0 stars I would do so
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fret Rattle
customer_reviews.text: Not adjusted. Not even close to being adjusted. Major fret rattle.
customer_reviews.author: z98133

customer_reviews.title: If you buy for only the color, that's what you'll get.
customer_reviews.text: This bass is okay for a beginners. I was attracted by the color, which is why I bought it. The pickups often give unwanted feedback, even on Monster cables. The action is very difficult to set. You'll need an allen wrench to adjust the tremolo height. The truss rod is there, but I have not needed to adjust it since neck is straight. It is pretty durable and heavy, which is expected of a bass. The only problems seem to be the bridge and the pickups. Does not seem worth it to replace pickups. Just get a different bass!
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Review on the body. (didn't play it)
customer_reviews.text: The bass wasn't to heavy my problem with it is the face of the guitar is so big, to me it makes the bass look ugly and bulky The green color is very sick in person, but it feels so cheap and plasticly I feel like it wasn't worth the almost 200 dollars I didn't get a chance to play it.
customer_reviews.author: nukeme

product_meta.title: Dean Custom Zone Bass, Nuclear Green
product_meta.description: Color:Nuclear GreenDean Custom Zone Solid Body Electric Bass guitars are sleek NEW designs, sensuous curves with Classic Dean playability make these a must have for any serious rocker! The Custom Zone sports a radical body color with matching neck. This Split Pickup Dean Bass has a lightweight Basswood body, Maple neck and fingerboard. The Dean Zone Bass Guitar is an unruly axe with shocking colors and a sensuous alder body. The maple fingerboard color matches the body and has black block markers and 20 frets. Split pickups and black hardware. No one can say you have ""just another bass."" Dean Custom Zone 4-String Bass Guitar features include color matching fingerboard popular neck contour split pickup bolt-on construction and black hardware

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
